metadata.title: CVE-2016-9188 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Moodle CMS on or before 3.1.2allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via thes_additionalhtmlhead, s_additionalhtmltopofbody, and s_additionalhtmlfooterparameters.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
